typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as integer,
		GlobalOrderID as string,
		SourceSystemCustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customers
Customers select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = GlobalOrderID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		RecordStartDate = CreatedDate,
		RecordEndDate = UpdatedDate
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 keyGenerate(output(CustomerSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(ActiveFlag = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		CustomerSK as integer,
		CustomerID as any,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		RecordStartDate as date,
		RecordEndDate as date,
		ActiveFlag as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerSK,
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		RecordStartDate,
		RecordEndDate,
		ActiveFlag
	)) ~> CustomerSink
